title: 'Purely ethnic profiling': New wave of Tigrayans detained
content:
1. 'Purely ethnic profiling': New wave of Tigrayans detained  Associated Press
  2. Latest: Rebels claim military gains in Ethiopia's restive Tigray region  Al Jazeera English
  3. U.N. rights council passes resolution calling for Eritrean troops to leave Tigray  Reuters
  4. Statement by UN High Commissioner for Refugees Filippo Grandi on the situation of Eritrean refugees in Ethiopia's Tigray Region  UNHCR
  5. UN urges ‘verifiable withdrawal’ of Eritrean troops from Tigray  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
